text.autoconfig.mineboxadditions.title: MineboxAdditions Configuration
Go to island when connecting to server
Enable network features ? (Must reconnect to take effect)
Display an alert when the shop offers are known
Send an alert to other MineboxAdditions users when you discover a shop offer
Display a logo in the top-left corner when it's full moon
mineboxadditions.strings.update.title: Update available
mineboxadditions.strings.update.content: A new version of MineboxAdditions is available, some network features may not function anymore in your current version !
mineboxadditions.strings.toasts.shop.mou: The mouse is ready to sell you one of it's finest french cheese ! Go and get it !
mineboxadditions.strings.toasts.shop.bak: Hmmm, what's that smell ? Bakery is now open !
mineboxadditions.strings.toasts.shop.buc: Need a caffeine shot ? Buckstar just opened !
mineboxadditions.strings.toasts.shop.coc: Need a refreshment ? The cocktail bar is open !
mineboxadditions.strings.toasts.shop.mou: Wanna have a bad breath ? The mouse's selling %1$s !
mineboxadditions.strings.toasts.shop.bak: Ovens are smoking, it smells like %1$s !
mineboxadditions.strings.toasts.shop.buc: Come and grab your %1$s at the Buckstar !
mineboxadditions.strings.toasts.shop.coc: The bartender is ready to serve you a %1$s !
